Looks good to me, thank you.

If I send you links to pictures, could you put them up for me too?  Are there dimension limits I need to know about?

J



----- Original Message ----
From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, July 24, 2008 1:54:12 PM
Subject: Re: OOC Info


Okay, 
 
Your characters are up. If you can, please check them over and make sure they are as you want them. I put them both in the independent/ unassigned sections. We can always move them later. 
 
 
Preston


--- On Wed, 7/23/08, jdmyemail <jdmyemail@yahoo. com> wrote:

From: jdmyemail <jdmyemail@yahoo. com>
Subject: Re: OOC Info
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com
Date: Wednesday, July 23, 2008, 8:18 PM


I'll try using Firefox to see if it makes any difference. It's just
annoying to not be able to present my posts very well.

Also, I can't get the wiki site figured out - I made a login and tried
to edit the pages, but nothing. If you don't mind, maybe you can put
it up for me? Here are my two bios (hope the format does wig too badly):

Jynx
Owned by: jdmyemail

Affiliation: Independent (Maximal)

Job/Rank: whacky mechanic

Beast/Vehicle Mode: common squirrel monkey

Skills: 
- mechanics/repairing
- boosting morale
- creating diversions

Weapons: 
- none known

Brief History

Arrived on prehistoric Earth in a stasis pod with Shard. They appear
to have a long history together, but neither talk about it much. Their
relationship is an awkward friendship at best, though Jynx would say
that they're lifelong pals, even if Shard is a little grumpy and
doesn't know it.

Shard
Owned by: jdmyemail

Affiliation: Independent (Predacon)

Job/Rank: heavy weapons/demolition

Beast/Vehicle Mode: unknown

Skills: 
- blowing stuff sky-high
- skilled fighter
- assembling/disassem bling bombs

Weapons: 
- flame thrower
- grenade launcher
- mines/grenades

Brief History

Arrived on prehistoric Earth in a stasis pod with Jynx. They appear to
have a long history together, but neither talk about it much. Their
relationship is an awkward friendship at best, though Shard will
insist he has no affiliation with Jynx, whom he considers a harmless loon.
